channel.title: RSPS on Linux
channel.description: Hey, i've been trying to get a rsps to run (just locally for now) on linux. I can get the basic server to run useing the "java" command. but i have no luck with the "javac" for compileing. any idea what this is? BTW, i jave JDK and JRE updated to the latest. thx.

item.title: RSPS on Linux
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

t4:

do you have JDK installed? if so, find where javac is located and set it in your bash path.

i have wrote .sh scripts for it…ill see if it works useing CD /jdk7/blahblah…etc and doing it from there.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS on Linux
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

do you have JDK installed? if so, find where javac is located and set it in your bash path.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS on Linux
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“itai, post:4, topic:428568”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=531260.msg3881196#msg3881196 date=1326046275]

Hey, i’ve been trying to get a rsps to run (just locally for now) on linux. I can get the basic server to run useing the “java” command. but i have no luck with the “javac” for compileing. any idea what this is? BTW, i jave JDK and JRE updated to the latest. thx.

Why not just compile on your computer then transfer over with ftp? That’s what I do.

huh? what exactly do u mean. Code in linux then compile in windows?
[/quote]
No, code + compile on windows then transfer to linux. Coding on VPS is not a great thing to do, wastes resources that could instead be going to the server.[/quote]

Uh, the Linux pc i have isnt a VPS bro. its the main PC i use. lol. i just wanted to kno how to run rs code/ compile it on it. XD

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS on Linux
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:3, topic:428568”][quote author=itai link=topic=531260.msg3881189#msg3881189 date=1326045926]

Hey, i’ve been trying to get a rsps to run (just locally for now) on linux. I can get the basic server to run useing the “java” command. but i have no luck with the “javac” for compileing. any idea what this is? BTW, i jave JDK and JRE updated to the latest. thx.

Why not just compile on your computer then transfer over with ftp? That’s what I do.
[/quote]

huh? what exactly do u mean. Code in linux then compile in windows?[/quote]
No, code + compile on windows then transfer to linux. Coding on VPS is not a great thing to do, wastes resources that could instead be going to the server.

Read full topic
